EmailTemplate.name: Vendor Request
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for your email and interest in working with YETI. I have forwarded your information along to our Sourcing Agent who will be in touch if there is immediate interest.
We appreciate you reaching out.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
